答.definition: to answer; to reply; to respond

答卷.definition: completed examination paper; answer sheet; CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]

答問.definition: to answer a question; question and answer

答對.definition: (usually used in the negative) to answer or reply to sb's question

答復.definition: variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]

答應.definition: to answer; to respond; to answer positively; to agree; to accept; to promise

答數.definition: numerical answer (to a question in math.); (Tw) (of troops) to shout numbers or phrases in unison (to keep in step or maintain morale)

答理.definition: (usu. used in the negative) to acknowledge (sb's greeting etc); to respond; to answer

答疑.definition: to answer questions (as teacher or consultant); to clarify doubts

答禮.definition: to return a courtesy; return gift

答腔.definition: to answer; to respond; to converse

答覆.definition: to answer; to reply; Reply to: (in email header)

答訕.definition: variant of 搭訕|搭讪[da1 shan4]

答辯.definition: to reply (to an accusation); to defend one's dissertation

答非所問.definition: (idiom) to sidestep the question; to answer evasively
